= Liberalistene Enonic Site
:toc: right

== Install 

[source, sh,options="nowrap"]
----
$ npm install
----

== Install Enonic client
Install link:https://developer.enonic.com/start[Enonic client].

== Run Enonic 

[source, sh,options="nowrap"]
----
$ enonic project deploy
----

== Storybook

[source, sh,options="nowrap"]
----
$ npm run storybook
----
